response.original_title: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
response.overview: Outlaw Jesse James is rumored to be the 'fastest gun in the West'. An eager recruit into James' notorious gang, Robert Ford eventually grows jealous of the famed outlaw and, when Robert and his brother sense an opportunity to kill James, their murderous action elevates their target to near mythical status.
response.tagline: Beyond the myth lies America's greatest betrayal
response.title: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford

قتل جسی جیمز توسط رابرت فورد بزدل
Як боязкий Роберт Форд убив Джесі Джеймса
비겁한 로버트 포드의 제시 제임스 암살
Zabitie Jesseho Jamesa zbabelcom Robertom Fordom
O Assassinato de Jesse James Pelo Covarde Robert Ford
